synopsis.text: After the reboot of the Digital World, the DigiDestined and their partner Digimon are reunited, but find that their Digimon have lost their memories of them. Sora is troubled by her Digimon partner Piyomon's indifference and refusal to speak to her. Suddenly, the group is attacked by a villainous Digimon who scatters them across the Digital World. In the real world, an agent named Nishijima receives word that Himekawa has disappeared while pursuing a hidden goal. Meanwhile, Meiko travels to the Digital World alone seeking her partner Meicoomon, who somehow retained her memories through the reboot. Meicoomon briefly appears to the DigiDestined kids before vanishing again. Determined to find and save Meicoomon, the kids set out on a journey across the unpredictable Digital World landscape, overcoming dangerous obstacles and hostile Digimon.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
